mapper.select: select u.id from users u left join disruptive_customers d on u.user_id = d.user_id where u.id like CONCAT('%', #{id}, '%') and (d.restriction_status != '제한됨' or d.restriction_status is null);
mapper.insert: insert into disruptive_customers(restriction_reason,restriction_status,user_id,created_at) select '제한됨', #{restrictionReason},u.user_id,NOW() from users u where u.id = #{id};
mapper.select: select u.id, d.restriction_reason, d.created_at, d.disruptive_customer_id from disruptive_customers d inner join users u on d.user_id = u.user_id where d.restriction_status = '제한됨' order by d.created_at desc LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}

select u.id, d.restriction_reason, d.created_at, d.disruptive_customer_id from disruptive_customers d left join users u on d.user_id = u.user_id where d.restriction_status = '제한됨'
and d.created_at >= CURDATE()
and d.created_at >= CURDATE() - interval 7 day
and d.created_at >= CURDATE() - interval 1 month
and d.created_at >= CURDATE() - interval 3 month
and d.created_at >= CURDATE() - interval 1 year
and (
u.id like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
d.restriction_reason like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
)
order by d.created_at desc
order by d.created_at asc
LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
